name: slotwise
description: High-velocity scheduling platform for solopreneurs and small businesses

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: cd services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../business-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:services" "npm run dev:nats"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:business" "npm run dev:scheduling" "npm run dev:notification"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: npm run build:auth && npm run build:business && npm run build:scheduling && npm run build:notification
scripts.build:auth: cd services/auth-service && go build -o bin/auth-service main.go
scripts.build:scheduling: cd services/scheduling-service && go build -o bin/scheduling-service main.go
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:services
scripts.test:services: npm run test:auth && npm run test:business && npm run test:scheduling && npm run test:notification
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:services
scripts.lint:services: npm run lint:business && npm run lint:notification
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:services
scripts.format:services: npm run format:business && npm run format:notification
scripts.clean: npm run clean:services && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:services: cd services/business-service && npm run clean && cd ../notification-service && npm run clean
scripts.db:migrate: npm run db:migrate:business && npm run db:migrate:notification
scripts.db:migrate:business: cd services/business-service && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:notification: cd services/notification-service && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.deps:update: npm run deps:update:go && npm run deps:update:node
scripts.deps:update:go: npm run deps:update:auth && npm run deps:update:scheduling
scripts.deps:update:auth: cd services/auth-service && go get -u && go mod tidy
scripts.deps:update:scheduling: cd services/scheduling-service && go get -u && go mod tidy
scripts.deps:update:node: npm run deps:update:business && npm run deps:update:notification && npm run deps:update:frontend
scripts.deps:audit: npm run deps:audit:node && npm run deps:audit:go
scripts.deps:audit:node: npm run deps:audit:business && npm run deps:audit:notification && npm run deps:audit:frontend
scripts.deps:audit:go: npm run deps:audit:auth && npm run deps:audit:scheduling
scripts.deps:audit:auth: cd services/auth-service && go list -json -deps ./... | nancy sleuth
scripts.deps:audit:scheduling: cd services/scheduling-service && go list -json -deps ./... | nancy sleuth

author: SlotWise Team
